eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
tsn: DIPHETIŠENE TSE DI ROMETSWENG GO DIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa ditirelo tsa tloso ya matlakala tse di tsweletseng go retelelwa mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba kwa Kokomeng le metse e e mabapi ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa le go beela kwa pele go bulwa gape ga seteishene sa mapodisi sa Kokomeng (Rre I S Seitlholo) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Mapodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (kgaolo 25), ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa go wa ga kabelo e e tshephegang ya motlakase mo mafelo a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa dituelo tse di kwa godimo tsa batho bao ba hirileng mo meagong ya khansele (Moh Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Matlo, Metsi le Kgelelo ya Leswe – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Jamestown, Stellenbosch, ba gwetlha Kokoano go batlisisa phetolo, ke Eskom, ya dithata tsa botsamaisi jwa kgolaganyo ya motlakase ya Jamestown go mmasepala wa Stellenbosch (Ng L Shreiber) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba -  Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Teropo ya Letsitele, Wate 23, Tzaneen, ba gwetlha Kokoano go netefatsa gore mmasepala wa Tzaneen o ikobela melao le melawana, le gore o tsenyatirisong thulaganyo ya tikologo go mafelong a a tshwanetseng, go tsenyeletsa le go elatlhoko le go emisa ditirwana tsotlhe tse di seng mo molaong (Moh D van der Walt) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go balemirui le baagi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ka kemedi ya AGRI Letaba, ba gwetlha Kopano go batlisisa go tima go go feteletseng ga motlakase, ketsaetsego go matla a motlakase, le tlhokomelo e e bokoa kgotsa e e seyong fa e sale 2016 ka ntlha ya go palelwa ga Mmasepala wa Greater Tzaneen (Moh D van der Walt) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

tsn: MANAANETLALELETSO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
tsn: DIPHETIŠENE TSE DI ROMETSWENG GO DIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa ditirelo tsa tloso ya matlakala tse di tsweletseng go retelelwa mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba kwa Kokomeng le metse e e mabapi ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa le go beela kwa pele go bulwa gape ga seteishene sa mapodisi sa Kokomeng (Rre I S Seitlholo) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Mapodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (kgaolo 25), ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa go wa ga kabelo e e tshephegang ya motlakase mo mafelo a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa dituelo tse di kwa godimo tsa batho bao ba hirileng mo meagong ya khansele (Moh Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Matlo, Metsi le Kgelelo ya Leswe – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Jamestown, Stellenbosch, ba gwetlha Kokoano go batlisisa phetolo, ke Eskom, ya dithata tsa botsamaisi jwa kgolaganyo ya motlakase ya Jamestown go mmasepala wa Stellenbosch (Ng L Shreiber) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba -  Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Teropo ya Letsitele, Wate 23, Tzaneen, ba gwetlha Kokoano go netefatsa gore mmasepala wa Tzaneen o ikobela melao le melawana, le gore o tsenyatirisong thulaganyo ya tikologo go mafelong a a tshwanetseng, go tsenyeletsa le go elatlhoko le go emisa ditirwana tsotlhe tse di seng mo molaong (Moh D van der Walt) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go balemirui le baagi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ka kemedi ya AGRI Letaba, ba gwetlha Kopano go batlisisa go tima go go feteletseng ga motlakase, ketsaetsego go matla a motlakase, le tlhokomelo e e bokoa kgotsa e e seyong fa e sale 2016 ka ntlha ya go palelwa ga Mmasepala wa Greater Tzaneen (Moh D van der Walt) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

tsn: DITUMELANO TSA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
tsn: Kamogelo le Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya India, Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Brazil le Puso le Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga Letlole la IBSA tebang le Phediso ya Bohuma le Tlala (e saenilwe ka di 17 Diphalane 2017) (E tlhagisitswe ka di 18 Diphalane 2019). (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka di 22 Diphalane 2019) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka 24 Diphalane 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Baagi ba Matla a Atomiki ba Yuropa (EURATOM) go Tirisanommogo go Tiriso e e Kagiso ya Matla a Nyutlere (E tlhagisitswe ka 14 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Didiriswa tsa Diminerale le Matla ka 18 Ngwanatsele 2019).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
tsn: Tšhata ya Aforika ya Dipalopalo (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bodiredipuso le Tsamaiso ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020 – reported on 29 July 2020).
tsn: Tumalano ya Botsalano le Tirisanommogo (TAC) le Borwa Botlhaba ba Asia (E tlhagisitswe ka 18 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: e rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka 26 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 11 Seetebosigo 2020 – e amogetswe ka 17 Seetebosigo 2020) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka 29 Seetebosigo 2020).

eng: APPENDIXES
tsn: MANAANETLALELETSO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
tsn: DIPHETIŠENE TSE DI ROMETSWENG GO DIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa ditirelo tsa tloso ya matlakala tse di tsweletseng go retelelwa mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba kwa Kokomeng le metse e e mabapi ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa le go beela kwa pele go bulwa gape ga seteishene sa mapodisi sa Kokomeng (Rre I S Seitlholo) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Mapodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (kgaolo 25), ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa go wa ga kabelo e e tshephegang ya motlakase mo mafelo a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa dituelo tse di kwa godimo tsa batho bao ba hirileng mo meagong ya khansele (Moh Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Matlo, Metsi le Kgelelo ya Leswe – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Jamestown, Stellenbosch, ba gwetlha Kokoano go batlisisa phetolo, ke Eskom, ya dithata tsa botsamaisi jwa kgolaganyo ya motlakase ya Jamestown go mmasepala wa Stellenbosch (Ng L Shreiber) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba -  Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, ba gwetlha Kokoano go batlisisa motlakase o o tswleletseng go tima mo Germiston (Moh M Clarke) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba - Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Teropo ya Letsitele, Wate 23, Tzaneen, ba gwetlha Kokoano go netefatsa gore mmasepala wa Tzaneen o ikobela melao le melawana, le gore o tsenyatirisong thulaganyo ya tikologo go mafelong a a tshwanetseng, go tsenyeletsa le go elatlhoko le go emisa ditirwana tsotlhe tse di seng mo molaong (Moh D van der Walt) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go balemirui le baagi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ka kemedi ya AGRI Letaba, ba gwetlha Kopano go batlisisa go tima go go feteletseng ga motlakase, ketsaetsego go matla a motlakase, le tlhokomelo e e bokoa kgotsa e e seyong fa e sale 2016 ka ntlha ya go palelwa ga Mmasepala wa Greater Tzaneen (Moh D van der Walt) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

tsn: MELAOTLHOMO E E ROMETSWENG GO KOMITITSHWARAGANELO YA MELAO (JTM)

tsn: Mametlelelo wa Molaotlhomo wa Melao ya Lephata la Ditšhelete [B 15 - 2020] (Kokoano Bosetšhaba – e e tshitsintsweng kar 75).

tsn: Mametlelelo ya Molatlhomo wa Tetlokhopi [B13B - 2017] (Kokoano Bosetšhaba – kar 75) le dipelaelo tsa Moporesidente ka ga go nna mo molaong ga Molaotlhomo jaaka o rometswe kwa go ena (Dikitsiso, Ditlhagiso le Dipegelo tsa Komiti, 22 Seetebosigo 2020, ts 2) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Kgwebisano le Madirelo – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
tsn: DITUMELANO TSA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
tsn: Kamogelo le Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya India, Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Brazil le Puso le Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga Letlole la IBSA tebang le Phediso ya Bohuma le Tlala (e saenilwe ka di 17 Diphalane 2017) (E tlhagisitswe ka di 18 Diphalane 2019). (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka di 22 Diphalane 2019) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka 24 Diphalane 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Baagi ba Matla a Atomiki ba Yuropa (EURATOM) go Tirisanommogo go Tiriso e e Kagiso ya Matla a Nyutlere (E tlhagisitswe ka 14 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Didiriswa tsa Diminerale le Matla ka 18 Ngwanatsele 2019).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
tsn: Tšhata ya Aforika ya Dipalopalo (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bodiredipuso le Tsamaiso ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020 – reported on 29 July 2020).
tsn: Tumalano ya Botsalano le Tirisanommogo (TAC) le Borwa Botlhaba ba Asia (E tlhagisitswe ka 18 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: e rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka 26 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 11 Seetebosigo 2020 – e amogetswe ka 17 Seetebosigo 2020) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka 29 Seetebosigo 2020 – e begilwe ka 29 Phukwi 2020).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (submitted by Ms H Ismail, MP) and Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (submitted by Ms H Ismail, MP) (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 15).
tsn: Tshekatsheko ya Pegelo ya Potfolio Komiti Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa palelo e e kwa godimo ya bosenyi le diritibatsi, go neelwa ga dikioseke tsa sepodisi le dikoloi tsa sepodisi mo kgaolong tsa bona (e rometswe ke Moh H Ismail, MP) le Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano go batlisisa palelo e e kwa godimo ya bosenyi le diritibatsi, go neelwa ga dikiosiki tsa sepodisi le dikoloi tsa sepodisi mo kgaolong tsa bona(e rometswe ke Moh H Ismail, MP)  – (Dikitsiso, Ditlhagiso le Dipegelo tsa Komiti, 26 Seetebosigo 2020, ts 15).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (submitted by Mr M Waters, MP) (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 4).
tsn: Tshekatsheko ya Pegelo ya Potfolio Komiti ya Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Kempton Park, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa ponagalo ya mapodisi e e sa lekanang e e tsweletseng le tlhaelo ya dikoloi kwa seteisheneng sa mapodisi sa Kempton Park (e rometswe ke Rre M Waters, MP) (Dikitsiso, Ditlhagiso le Dipegelo tsa Komiti, 26 Seetebosigo 2020, ts 4).

eng: APPENDIXES
tsn: MANAANETLALELETSO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
tsn: DIPHETIŠENE TSE DI ROMETSWENG GO DIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa ditirelo tsa tloso ya matlakala tse di tsweletseng go retelelwa mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba kwa Kokomeng le metse e e mabapi ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa le go beela kwa pele go bulwa gape ga seteishene sa mapodisi sa Kokomeng (Rre I S Seitlholo) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Mapodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (kgaolo 25), ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa go wa ga kabelo e e tshephegang ya motlakase mo mafelo a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa dituelo tse di kwa godimo tsa batho bao ba hirileng mo meagong ya khansele (Moh Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Matlo, Metsi le Kgelelo ya Leswe – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Jamestown, Stellenbosch, ba gwetlha Kokoano go batlisisa phetolo, ke Eskom, ya dithata tsa botsamaisi jwa kgolaganyo ya motlakase ya Jamestown go mmasepala wa Stellenbosch (Ng L Shreiber) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba -  Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, ba gwetlha Kokoano go batlisisa motlakase o o tswleletseng go tima mo Germiston (Moh M Clarke) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba - Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Teropo ya Letsitele, Wate 23, Tzaneen, ba gwetlha Kokoano go netefatsa gore mmasepala wa Tzaneen o ikobela melao le melawana, le gore o tsenyatirisong thulaganyo ya tikologo go mafelong a a tshwanetseng, go tsenyeletsa le go elatlhoko le go emisa ditirwana tsotlhe tse di seng mo molaong (Moh D van der Walt) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go balemirui le baagi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ka kemedi ya AGRI Letaba, ba gwetlha Kopano go batlisisa go tima go go feteletseng ga motlakase, ketsaetsego go matla a motlakase, le tlhokomelo e e bokoa kgotsa e e seyong fa e sale 2016 ka ntlha ya go palelwa ga Mmasepala wa Greater Tzaneen (Moh D van der Walt) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
tsn: Kamogelo le Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya India, Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Brazil le Puso le Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga Letlole la IBSA tebang le Phediso ya Bohuma le Tlala (e saenilwe ka di 17 Diphalane 2017) (E tlhagisitswe ka di 18 Diphalane 2019). (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka di 22 Diphalane 2019) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka 24 Diphalane 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Baagi ba Matla a Atomiki ba Yuropa (EURATOM) go Tirisanommogo go Tiriso e e Kagiso ya Matla a Nyutlere (E tlhagisitswe ka 14 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Didiriswa tsa Diminerale le Matla ka 18 Ngwanatsele 2019).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
tsn: Tšhata ya Aforika ya Dipalopalo (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bodiredipuso le Tsamaiso ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020 – reported on 29 July 2020).
tsn: Tumalano ya Botsalano le Tirisanommogo (TAC) le Borwa Botlhaba ba Asia (E tlhagisitswe ka 18 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: e rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka 26 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 11 Seetebosigo 2020 – e amogetswe ka 17 Seetebosigo 2020) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka 29 Seetebosigo 2020 – e begilwe ka 29 Phukwi 2020).

eng: APPENDIXES
tsn: MANAANETLALELETSO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
tsn: DIPHETIŠENE TSE DI ROMETSWENG GO DIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa ditirelo tsa tloso ya matlakala tse di tsweletseng go retelelwa mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba kwa Kokomeng le metse e e mabapi ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa le go beela kwa pele go bulwa gape ga seteishene sa mapodisi sa Kokomeng (Rre I S Seitlholo) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Mapodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (kgaolo 25), ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa go wa ga kabelo e e tshephegang ya motlakase mo mafelo a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa dituelo tse di kwa godimo tsa batho bao ba hirileng mo meagong ya khansele (Moh Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Matlo, Metsi le Kgelelo ya Leswe – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Jamestown, Stellenbosch, ba gwetlha Kokoano go batlisisa phetolo, ke Eskom, ya dithata tsa botsamaisi jwa kgolaganyo ya motlakase ya Jamestown go mmasepala wa Stellenbosch (Ng L Shreiber) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba -  Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Teropo ya Letsitele, Wate 23, Tzaneen, ba gwetlha Kokoano go netefatsa gore mmasepala wa Tzaneen o ikobela melao le melawana, le gore o tsenyatirisong thulaganyo ya tikologo go mafelong a a tshwanetseng, go tsenyeletsa le go elatlhoko le go emisa ditirwana tsotlhe tse di seng mo molaong (Moh D van der Walt) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go balemirui le baagi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ka kemedi ya AGRI Letaba, ba gwetlha Kopano go batlisisa go tima go go feteletseng ga motlakase, ketsaetsego go matla a motlakase, le tlhokomelo e e bokoa kgotsa e e seyong fa e sale 2016 ka ntlha ya go palelwa ga Mmasepala wa Greater Tzaneen (Moh D van der Walt) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
tsn: Kamogelo le Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya India, Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Brazil le Puso le Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga Letlole la IBSA tebang le Phediso ya Bohuma le Tlala (e saenilwe ka di 17 Diphalane 2017) (E tlhagisitswe ka di 18 Diphalane 2019). (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka di 22 Diphalane 2019) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka 24 Diphalane 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Baagi ba Matla a Atomiki ba Yuropa (EURATOM) go Tirisanommogo go Tiriso e e Kagiso ya Matla a Nyutlere (E tlhagisitswe ka 14 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Didiriswa tsa Diminerale le Matla ka 18 Ngwanatsele 2019).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
tsn: Tšhata ya Aforika ya Dipalopalo (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bodiredipuso le Tsamaiso ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020 – reported on 29 July 2020).
tsn: Tumalano ya Botsalano le Tirisanommogo (TAC) le Borwa Botlhaba ba Asia (E tlhagisitswe ka 18 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: e rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka 26 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 11 Seetebosigo 2020 – e amogetswe ka 17 Seetebosigo 2020) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka 29 Seetebosigo 2020 – e begilwe ka 29 Phukwi 2020).

eng: APPENDIXES
tsn: MANAANETLALELETSO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
tsn: DIPHETIŠENE TSE DI ROMETSWENG GO DIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa ditirelo tsa tloso ya matlakala tse di tsweletseng go retelelwa mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba kwa Kokomeng le metse e e mabapi ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa le go beela kwa pele go bulwa gape ga seteishene sa mapodisi sa Kokomeng (Rre I S Seitlholo) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Mapodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (kgaolo 25), ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa go wa ga kabelo e e tshephegang ya motlakase mo mafelo a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa dituelo tse di kwa godimo tsa batho bao ba hirileng mo meagong ya khansele (Moh Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Matlo, Metsi le Kgelelo ya Leswe – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
tsn: Phethišene go tswa go baagi ba Germiston, Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano go batlisisa go tima ga motlakase kwa Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Teropo ya Letsitele, Wate 23, Tzaneen, ba gwetlha Kokoano go netefatsa gore mmasepala wa Tzaneen o ikobela melao le melawana, le gore o tsenyatirisong thulaganyo ya tikologo go mafelong a a tshwanetseng, go tsenyeletsa le go elatlhoko le go emisa ditirwana tsotlhe tse di seng mo molaong (Moh D van der Walt) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go balemirui le baagi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ka kemedi ya AGRI Letaba, ba gwetlha Kopano go batlisisa go tima go go feteletseng ga motlakase, ketsaetsego go matla a motlakase, le tlhokomelo e e bokoa kgotsa e e seyong fa e sale 2016 ka ntlha ya go palelwa ga Mmasepala wa Greater Tzaneen (Moh D van der Walt) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
tsn: DITUMELANO TSA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
tsn: Kamogelo le Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya India, Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Brazil le Puso le Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga Letlole la IBSA tebang le Phediso ya Bohuma le Tlala (e saenilwe ka di 17 Diphalane 2017) (E tlhagisitswe ka di 18 Diphalane 2019). (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka di 22 Diphalane 2019) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka 24 Diphalane 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Baagi ba Matla a Atomiki ba Yuropa (EURATOM) go Tirisanommogo go Tiriso e e Kagiso ya Matla a Nyutlere (E tlhagisitswe ka 14 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Didiriswa tsa Diminerale le Matla ka 18 Ngwanatsele 2019).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
tsn: Tšhata ya Aforika ya Dipalopalo (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bodiredipuso le Tsamaiso ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020 – reported on 29 July 2020).
tsn: Tumalano ya Botsalano le Tirisanommogo (TAC) le Borwa Botlhaba ba Asia (E tlhagisitswe ka 18 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: e rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka 26 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 11 Seetebosigo 2020 – e amogetswe ka 17 Seetebosigo 2020) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka 29 Phukwi 2020 – e begilwe ka 29 Phukwi 2020).

eng: MOTIONS:
tsn: DITSHITSINYO:

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House, notwithstanding Rule 139(1), which deals with questions for oral reply in respect of the Deputy President, permits that replies in respect of oral questions that were due to be given on 20 August 2020, be submitted in writing as agreed by the National Assembly Programme Committee.
tsn: Tshwetsokakangwa (Semesegolo sa Lekoko le le Busang): Gore Ntlo, e sa ikgatholose Molao 139(1), o o samaganang le dipotso tse di arabiwang ka molomo ke Motlatsa Moporesidente, e letlelele gore dikarabo tsa dipotso ka molomo tseo di neng di tshwanetse go arabiwa ka 20 Phatwe 2020, di kwadiwe le go romelwa go Komiti ya Lenaneo la Kokoano Bosetšhaba jaaka go dumalanwe.

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa ditirelo tsa tloso ya matlakala tse di tsweletseng go retelelwa mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
tsn: Phethišene go tswa go baagi ba Germiston, Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano go batlisisa go tima ga motlakase kwa Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Teropo ya Letsitele, Wate 23, Tzaneen, ba gwetlha Kokoano go netefatsa gore mmasepala wa Tzaneen o ikobela melao le melawana, le gore o tsenyatirisong thulaganyo ya tikologo go mafelong a a tshwanetseng, go tsenyeletsa le go elatlhoko le go emisa ditirwana tsotlhe tse di seng mo molaong (Moh D van der Walt) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go balemirui le baagi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ka kemedi ya AGRI Letaba, ba gwetlha Kopano go batlisisa go tima go go feteletseng ga motlakase, ketsaetsego go matla a motlakase, le tlhokomelo e e bokoa kgotsa e e seyong fa e sale 2016 ka ntlha ya go palelwa ga Mmasepala wa Greater Tzaneen (Moh D van der Walt) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
tsn: DITUMELANO TSA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
tsn: Kamogelo le Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya India, Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Brazil le Puso le Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga Letlole la IBSA tebang le Phediso ya Bohuma le Tlala (e saenilwe ka di 17 Diphalane 2017) (E tlhagisitswe ka di 18 Diphalane 2019). (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka di 22 Diphalane 2019) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka 24 Diphalane 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Baagi ba Matla a Atomiki ba Yuropa (EURATOM) go Tirisanommogo go Tiriso e e Kagiso ya Matla a Nyutlere (E tlhagisitswe ka 14 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Didiriswa tsa Diminerale le Matla ka 18 Ngwanatsele 2019).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020 – reported on 29 July 2020).
tsn: Tumalano ya Botsalano le Tirisanommogo (TAC) le Borwa Botlhaba ba Asia (E tlhagisitswe ka 18 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: e rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka 26 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 11 Seetebosigo 2020 – e amogetswe ka 17 Seetebosigo 2020) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka 29 Phukwi 2020 – e begilwe ka 29 Phukwi 2020).

eng: Subject for discussion (Dr N P Nkabane): Transforming society and uniting the country by cultivating a shared recommitment to constitutional values that promote nation-building, strengthen social cohesion and improve the quality of life for all South Africans.
tsn: Ntlha ya Puisano (Ng N P Nkabane): Go fetola setšhaba le go kopanya naga ka go tsweletsa maitlamo a a kopanetsweng go meetlo ya molaotheo eo e tsweletsang kago ya setšhaba, e natlafatsa tshwaragano ya loago le go tokafatsa boleng jwa botshelo jwa Maaforikaborwa otlhe.

tsn: MANAANETLALELETSO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
tsn: DIPHETIŠENE TSE DI ROMETSWENG GO DIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Germiston, mmasepalamogolo wa Ekurhuleni ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa go tima ga motlakase go go tsweletseng (Rre M Waters) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Boksburg, mmasepalamogolo wa Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa go tima ga motlakase go go tsweletseng (Rre M Waters) – Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Kempton Park, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa ponagalo ya mapodisi e e sa lekanang e e tsweletseng le tlhaelo ya dikoloi kwa seteisheneng sa mapodisi sa Kempton Park (Rre M Waters) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Mapodisi –  Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Alberton, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa botsayakarolo jwa baagi le go latelwa ga molao go tlhabololo ya matlo e e tshitsintsweng mo Alberton (Rre D Bergman) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Wattville, Benoni ba ipiletsa go Kokoano go rarabolola bosenyi jo bo tsweletseng go gola, go tsenyeletsa le tirisodikgoka e e ikaegileng ka bong le tirisodikgoka kgatlhanong le bana, le tlhokego ya seteišene sa mapodisa mo kgaolong tsa bona (Rre H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Sepodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano go batlisisa palelo e e kwa godimo ya bosenyi le diritibatsi, go neelwa ga dikioseke tsa sepodisi le dikoloi tsa sepodisi mo kgaolong tsa bona (Rre H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Sepodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano go batlisisa ditirelo tsa tloso ya matlakala tse di tsweletseng go retelelwa mo kgaolong tsa bona (Rre H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba kwa Kokomeng le metse e e mabapi ba gwetlha Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa le go beela kwa pele go bulwa gape ga seteishene sa mapodisi sa Kokomeng (Rre I S Seitlholo) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Mapodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (kgaolo 25), ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni ba gwetlha Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa go wag a kabelo e e tshephegang ya motlakase mo mafelo a bona (Mme H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaragamelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Mr H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Actonville, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano go batlisisa dituelo tse di kwa godimo tsa batho bao ba hirileng mo meagong ya khansele Moh Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti Matlo, Metsi le Kgelelo ya Leswe – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Ward 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the illegal occupation of stand 1/1224 number 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs and Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Kgaolo 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano go batlisisa bodulo jo bo seng mo molaong jwa ntlo 1/1224 nomoro 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Rre D Bergman) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso le Potfolio Komiti ya Sepodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
tsn: DITUMELANO TSA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Convention establishing the Square Kilometre Array (SKA) Observatory (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 – reported on 8 October 2019 – approved on 6 November 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 - reported on 19 February 2020).
tsn: Tumelano ya go tlhomiwa ga Thelesekoupo ya Arei Sekwere kilomitara (SKA) (E e tlhagisitsweng ka di 18 Lwetse 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Thuto e Kgolwane le Thekenoloji ka di 19 Lwetse 2019 – e begilwe ka di 8 Diphalane 2019 – e amogetswe ka 6 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Thuto le Thekenoloji, Metshameko, Botaki le Setso ka 19 Ngwanatsele 2019). – e begilwe ka 19 Tlhakole 2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019).
tsn: Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Setheo sa Boditšhabatšhaba sa Phetolo ya Jenetiki le Phetolotshelo (ICGEB) go Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga go tlhomiwa ga Karolo ya Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Phetolo ya Jenetiki le Phetolotshelo (ICGEB) mo Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ( E e tlhagisitsweng ka di 18 Lwetse 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Thuto e Kgolwane, Saense le Thekenoloji ka di 19 Lwetse 2019 – e begilwe ka 5 Sedimonthole 2019) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Thuto le Thekenoloji, Metshameko, Botaki le Setso ka 19 Ngwanatsele 2019).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
tsn: Kamogelo le Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya India, Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Brazil le Puso le Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga Letlole la IBSA tebang le Phediso ya Bohuma le Tlala (e saenilwe ka di 17 Diphalane 2017) (E tlhagisitswe ka di 18 Diphalane 2019). (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka di 22 Diphalane 2019) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka 24 Diphalane 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Extradition (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020).
tsn: Kgolagano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Bangladesh go Pusetso (E tlhagisitswe ka 14 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo ka 18 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka di 30 Ferikgong 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020).
tsn: Kgolagano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Bangladesh go Thuso ya tumalano ya semolao ya Dintlha tsa Bosenyi (E tlhagisitswe ka 14 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo ka 18 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka di 30 Ferikgong 2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Baagi ba Matla a Atomiki ba Yuropa (EURATOM) go Tirisanommogo go Tiriso e e Kagiso ya Matla a Nyutlere (E tlhagisitswe ka 14 Ngwanatsele 2019) (E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Didiriswa tsa Diminerale le Matla ka 18 Ngwanatsele 2019).

eng: MOTIONS:
tsn: DITSHITSINYO:

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House extends the deadline by which the Ad Hoc Committee to initiate and introduce legislation amending section 25 of the Constitution has to complete its task to 30 May 2020.
tsn: Tshwetsokakangwa (Semesegolo sa Lekoko le le Busang): Gore Ntlo eno e atolose letlha la bofelo la Komiti ya Nakwana ya go itsise mametlelelo ya kgaolo 25 ya Molaotheo go wetsa tiro ka di 29 Motsheganong 2020.

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House revives the Aquaculture Development Bill [B 22 - 2018] (National Assembly –sec 76) and resumes proceedings on the Bill from the stage it reached on the last day of the sixth session of the Fifth Parliament.
tsn: Tshwetsokakangwa (Semesegolo sa Lekoko le le Busang): Gore Ntlo eno e tsosolotse Molaotlhomo wa Tlhabololo ya Temothuo ya mo Metsing [B 22 - 2018] (Kokoano Bosetšhaba –kar 76) le go tsweletsa ditsamaiso ka ga Molaotlhomo go tswa go kgato eo e neng e fitlheletswe mo letsatsing la bofelo la kopano ya borataro ya Palamente ya Botlhano.

eng: ORDERS OF THE DAY:
tsn: DITHULAGANYO TSA LETSATSI

eng: Debate in terms of Rule 130: The Coronavirus and the readiness of South Africa to deal with the pandemic – (Ms S Gwarube).
tsn: Ngangisano go ya ka Molao 130: Bolwetse jwa Coronavirus le gore Aforika Borwa e ipaakantse go le kae go samagana le bolwetse jo – (Moh S Gwarube).

tsn: Ntlha ya puisano (Rre G G Mpumza): Go matlafatsa Puso ya Selegae go bobusi jo bo siameng.

tsn: MANAANETLALELETSO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
tsn: DIPHETIŠENE TSE DI ROMETSWENG GO DIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Germiston, mmasepalamogolo wa Ekurhuleni ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa go tima ga motlakase go go tsweletseng (Rre M Waters) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Boksburg, mmasepalamogolo wa Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa go tima ga motlakase go go tsweletseng (Rre M Waters) – Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Kempton Park, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa ponagalo ya mapodisi e e sa lekanang e e tsweletseng le tlhaelo ya dikoloi kwa seteisheneng sa mapodisi sa Kempton Park (Rre M Waters) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Mapodisi –  Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Alberton, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa botsayakarolo jwa baagi le go latelwa ga molao go tlhabololo ya matlo e e tshitsintsweng mo Alberton (Rre D Bergman) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Wattville, Benoni ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go rarabolola bosenyi jo bo tsweletseng go gola, go tsenyeletsa le tirisodikgoka e e ikaegileng ka bong le tirisodikgoka kgatlhanong le bana, le tlhokego ya seteišene sa mapodisa mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Sepodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa palelo e e kwa godimo ya bosenyi le diritibatsi, go neelwa ga dikioseke tsa sepodisi le dikoloi tsa sepodisi mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Sepodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa ditirelo tsa tloso ya matlakala tse di tsweletseng go retelelwa mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba kwa Kokomeng le metse e e mabapi ba gwetlha Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa le go beela kwa pele go bulwa gape ga seteishene sa mapodisi sa Kokomeng (Rre I S Seitlholo) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Mapodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (kgaolo 25), ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni ba gwetlha Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa go wag a kabelo e e tshephegang ya motlakase mo mafelo a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaragamelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa dituelo tse di kwa godimo tsa batho bao ba hirileng mo meagong ya khansele (Moh Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti Matlo, Metsi le Kgelelo ya Leswe – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Ward 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the illegal occupation of stand 1/1224 number 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs and Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Kgaolo 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa bodulo jo bo seng mo molaong jwa ntlo 1/1224 nomoro 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Rre D Bergman) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso le Potfolio Komiti ya Sepodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
tsn: DITUMELANO TSA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Convention establishing the Square Kilometre Array (SKA) Observatory (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 – reported on 8 October 2019 – approved on 6 November 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 - reported on 19 February 2020).
tsn: Tumelano ya go tlhomiwa ga Thelesekoupo ya Arei Sekwere kilomitara (SKA) (E e tlhagisitsweng ka di 18 Lwetse 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Thuto e Kgolwane le Thekenoloji ka di 19 Lwetse 2019 – e begilwe ka di 8 Diphalane 2019 – e amogetswe ka 6 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho yaThuto le Thekenoloji, Metshameko, Botaki le Setso ka 19 Ngwanatsele 2019). – e begilwe ka 19 Tlhakole 2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019).
tsn: Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Setheo sa Boditšhabatšhaba sa Phetolo ya Jenetiki le Phetolotshelo (ICGEB) go Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga go tlhomiwa ga Karolo ya Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Phetolo ya Jenetiki le Phetolotshelo (ICGEB) mo Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ( E e tlhagisitsweng ka di 18 Lwetse 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Thuto e Kgolwane, Saense le Thekenoloji ka di 19 Lwetse 2019 – e begilwe ka 5 Sedimonthole 2019) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Thuto le Thekenoloji, Metshameko, Botaki le Setso ka 19 Ngwanatsele 2019).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
tsn: Kamogelo le Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya India, Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Brazil le Puso le Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga Letlole la IBSA tebang le Phediso ya Bohuma le Tlala (e saenilwe ka di 17 Diphalane 2017) (E tlhagisitswe ka di 18 Diphalane 2019). (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka di 22 Diphalane 2019) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka 24 Diphalane 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Extradition (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020).
tsn: Kgolagano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Bangladesh go Pusetso (E tlhagisitswe ka 14 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo ka 18 Ngwanatsele 2019-e begilwe ka 3 Mopitlwe 2020) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka di 30 Ferikgong 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020).
tsn: Kgolagano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Bangladesh go Thuso ya tumalano ya semolao ya Dintlha tsa Bosenyi (E tlhagisitswe ka 14 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo ka 18 Ngwanatsele 2019 – e begilwe ka 3 Mopitlwe 2020) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka di 30 Ferikgong 2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Baagi ba Matla a Atomiki ba Yuropa (EURATOM) go Tirisanommogo go Tiriso e e Kagiso ya Matla a Nyutlere (E tlhagisitswe ka 14 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Didiriswa tsa Diminerale le Matla ka 18 Ngwanatsele 2019).
