eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
tsn: DITUMELANO TSA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
tsn: Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Setheo sa Boditšhabatšhaba sa Phetolo ya Jenetiki le Phetolotshelo (ICGEB) go Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga go tlhomiwa ga Karolo ya Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Phetolo ya Jenetiki le Phetolotshelo (ICGEB) mo Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ( E e tlhagisitsweng ka di 18 Lwetse 2019)(NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Thuto e Kgolwane, Saense le Thekenoloji ka di 19 Lwetse 2019 – e begilwe ka 5 Sedimonthole 2019 – e amogetswe ka 10 Mopitlwe 2020) 2019- e begilwe ka 26 Motsheganong 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
tsn: Kamogelo le Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya India, Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Brazil le Puso le Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga Letlole la IBSA tebang le Phediso ya Bohuma le Tlala (e saenilwe ka di 17 Diphalane 2017) (E tlhagisitswe ka di 18 Diphalane 2019). (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka di 22 Diphalane 2019) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka 24 Diphalane 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Extradition (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020 - approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020 – reported on 17 March 2020).
tsn: Kgolagano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Bangladesh go Pusetso (E tlhagisitswe ka 14 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo ka 18 Ngwanatsele 2019-e begilwe ka 3 Mopitlwe 2020 – e amogetswe ka 10 Mopitlwe 2020) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka di 30 Ferikgong 2020– e begilwe ka 17 Mopitlwe 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020 - approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020 – reported on 17 March 2020).
tsn: Kgolagano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Bangladesh go Thuso ya tumalano ya semolao ya Dintlha tsa Bosenyi (E tlhagisitswe ka 14 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo ka 18 Ngwanatsele 2019 – e begilwe ka 3 Mopitlwe 2020) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka di 30 Ferikgong 2020– e begilwe ka 17 Mopitlwe 2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Baagi ba Matla a Atomiki ba Yuropa (EURATOM) go Tirisanommogo go Tiriso e e Kagiso ya Matla a Nyutlere (E tlhagisitswe ka 14 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Didiriswa tsa Diminerale le Matla ka 18 Ngwanatsele 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Puso ya United Mexican States ka ga Tumalano ya Dithuso tsa Semolao ka ga Dintlha tsa Bosenyi (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020) (NCOP – E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Bosiamisi le Kgopololo ka 10 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 1 Seetebosigo 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Puso ya Dinaga TSe DI Kopaneng tsa Mexicane ka ga Pusetsogae (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020) (NCOP – E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Bosiamisi le Kgopololo ka 10 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 1 Seetebosigo 2020).

tsn: Tšhata ya Aforika ya Dipalopalo (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bodiredipuso le Tsamaiso ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020).

eng: ORDERS OF THE DAY:
tsn: DITHULAGANYO TSA LETSATSI:

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on Notices determining remuneration of Public Protector and Commissioners of South African Human Rights Commission with effect from 1 April 2019 (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 22 June 2020, p 15).
tsn: Tshekatsheko ya Pegelo ya Potfolio Komiti ya bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo ka ga Dikitsiso tse di laolang dituelo tsa Mosireletsi wa Setšhaba le Bakhomishenara ba Khomishene ya Aforika Borwa ya Ditshwanelo tsa Botho go tloga ka 1 Moranang 2019 (Dikitsiso, Ditlhagiso le Dipegelo tsa Komiti, 22 Seetebosigo 2020, ts 15).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Defence on Letters from the President on Employment of South African National Defence Force in Mozambique Channel, Democratic Republic of Congo, to Wuhan City in Hubei Province of People’s Republic of China, and in support of South African Police Service and other State Departments (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 19 June 2020, p 3).
tsn: Tshekatsheko ya Pegelo ya Komitikemo Tshwaraganelwa ya Tshireletso ka ga Makwalo go tswa go Moporesidente ka go Thapiwa ga Masole a Bosetšhaba a Aforika Borwa kwa Mozambique Channel, Democratic Republic of Congo, kwa teropong ya Wuhan City mo Porofenseng ya Hubei, People’s Republic of China, le go tshegetsa Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa le Mafapha a Puso a mangwe (Dikitsiso, Ditlhagiso le Dipegelo tsa Komiti 19 Seetebosigo 2020, ts 3).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (submitted by Mr M Waters, MP) and Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (submitted by Mr M Waters, MP)  (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 167).
tsn: Tshekatsheko ya Pegelo ya Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso ka ga Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Boksburg, mmasepalamogolo wa Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa go tima ga motlakase go go tsweletseng (e e rometsweng ke Rre M Waters, MP) le Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Germiston, mmasepalamogolo wa Ekurhuleni ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa go tima ga motlakase go go tsweletseng (e e rometsweng ke Rre M Waters, MP)  (Dikitsiso, Ditlhagiso le Dipegelo tsa Komiti, 18 Seetebosigo 2020, ts 167).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (submitted by Mr D Bergman, MP) (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 166).
tsn: Tshekatsheko ya Pegelo ya Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso ka ga Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Alberton, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa botsayakarolo jwa baagi le go latelwa ga molao go tlhabololo ya matlo e e tshitsintsweng mo Alberton (e rometswe ke Rre Mr D Bergman, MP) (Dikitsiso, Ditlhagiso le Dipegelo tsa Komiti, 18 Seetebosigo 2020, ts 166).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition relating to Glen Marais Sub-Station Fire Incident under City of Ekurhuleni (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 163).
tsn: Tshekatsheko ya Pegelo ya Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso ka ga Phetišene e e amanang le tiragalo ya kwa Seteishenepotlaneng sa Ditimamelelo sa kwa Glen Marais mo tlase ga Mmasepalamogolo wa Ekurhuleni (Dikitsiso, Ditlhagiso le Dipegelo tsa Komiti, 18 Seetebosigo 2020, ts 163).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition from the residents of Ward 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the illegal occupation of stand 1/1224 number 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (submitted by Mr D Bergman, MP) (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 160).
tsn: Tshekatsheko ya Pegelo ya Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso ka ga Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Kgaolo 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa bodulo jo bo seng mo molaong jwa ntlo 1/1224 nomoro 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (e rometswe ke Rre D Bergman -MP) (Dikitsiso, Ditlhagiso le Dipegelo tsa Komiti, 18 Seetebosigo 2020, ts 160).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition pertaining to Service Delivery in Nemallpius Ext 22, under City of Tshwane (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 157).
tsn: Tshekatsheko ya Pegelo ya Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso ka ga Phetišene e e malebana le Thebolelo Ditirelo kwa Nemallpius Ext 22, mo tlase ga Teropo ya Tshwane (Dikitsiso, Ditlhagiso le Dipegelo tsa Komiti, 18 Seetebosigo 2020, ts 157).

eng: APPENDIXES
tsn: MANAANETLALELETSO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
tsn: DIPHETIŠENE TSE DI ROMETSWENG GO DIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Kempton Park, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa ponagalo ya mapodisi e e sa lekanang e e tsweletseng le tlhaelo ya dikoloi kwa seteisheneng sa mapodisi sa Kempton Park (Rre M Waters) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Mapodisi –  Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Wattville, Benoni ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go rarabolola bosenyi jo bo tsweletseng go gola, go tsenyeletsa le tirisodikgoka e e ikaegileng ka bong le tirisodikgoka kgatlhanong le bana, le tlhokego ya seteišene sa mapodisa mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Sepodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa palelo e e kwa godimo ya bosenyi le diritibatsi, go neelwa ga dikioseke tsa sepodisi le dikoloi tsa sepodisi mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Sepodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa ditirelo tsa tloso ya matlakala tse di tsweletseng go retelelwa mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba kwa Kokomeng le metse e e mabapi ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa le go beela kwa pele go bulwa gape ga seteishene sa mapodisi sa Kokomeng (Rre I S Seitlholo) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Mapodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (kgaolo 25), ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa go wa ga kabelo e e tshephegang ya motlakase mo mafelo a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaragamelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa dituelo tse di kwa godimo tsa batho bao ba hirileng mo meagong ya khansele (Moh Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti Matlo, Metsi le Kgelelo ya Leswe – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
tsn: DITUMELANO TSA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
tsn: Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Setheo sa Boditšhabatšhaba sa Phetolo ya Jenetiki le Phetolotshelo (ICGEB) go Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga go tlhomiwa ga Karolo ya Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Phetolo ya Jenetiki le Phetolotshelo (ICGEB) mo Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ( E e tlhagisitsweng ka di 18 Lwetse 2019)(NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Thuto e Kgolwane, Saense le Thekenoloji ka di 19 Lwetse 2019 – e begilwe ka 5 Sedimonthole 2019 – e amogetswe ka 10 Mopitlwe 2020) 2019- e begilwe ka 26 Motsheganong 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
tsn: Kamogelo le Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya India, Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Brazil le Puso le Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga Letlole la IBSA tebang le Phediso ya Bohuma le Tlala (e saenilwe ka di 17 Diphalane 2017) (E tlhagisitswe ka di 18 Diphalane 2019). (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka di 22 Diphalane 2019) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka 24 Diphalane 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Baagi ba Matla a Atomiki ba Yuropa (EURATOM) go Tirisanommogo go Tiriso e e Kagiso ya Matla a Nyutlere (E tlhagisitswe ka 14 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Didiriswa tsa Diminerale le Matla ka 18 Ngwanatsele 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Puso ya United Mexican States ka ga Tumalano ya Dithuso tsa Semolao ka ga Dintlha tsa Bosenyi (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020) (NCOP – E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Bosiamisi le Kgopololo ka 10 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 1 Seetebosigo 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 202 0– approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Puso ya Dinaga Tse di Kopaneng tsa Mexicane ka ga Pusetsogae (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020) (NCOP – E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Bosiamisi le Kgopololo ka 10 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 1 Seetebosigo 2020).

tsn: Tshekatsheko ya Pegelo ya Potfolio Komiti ya Kgwebisano le Madirelo ka ga Mafapha a Kgwebisano le Madirelo le Tlhabololo ya Ikonomi mo Kwatareng ya Bobedi le tiragatso e e seng ya Ditšhelete ya ngwaga wa 2019/20 ya ngwaga wa ditšhelete (Dikitsiso, Ditlhagiso le Dipegelo tsa Dikomiti, 5 Sedimonthole 2019, ts 4).

eng: Consideration of Report of Standing Committee on Auditor-General on Integrated Annual Report of Auditor-General for financial year 2018/19 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 4 December 2019, p 3).
tsn: Tshekatsheko ya Pegelo ya Komitikemo ka ga Moruni-Kakaretso ka ga Pegelo e e Kopaneng ya Ngwaga ya Moruni-Kakaretso ya ngwaga wa ditšhelete 2018/19 (Dikitsiso, Ditlhagiso le Dipegelo tsa Dikomiti, 4 Sedimonthole 2019, ts 3).

eng: APPENDIXES
tsn: MANAANETLALELETSO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
tsn: DIPHETIŠENE TSE DI ROMETSWENG GO DIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Germiston, mmasepalamogolo wa Ekurhuleni ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa go tima ga motlakase go go tsweletseng (Rre M Waters) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Boksburg, mmasepalamogolo wa Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa go tima ga motlakase go go tsweletseng (Rre M Waters) – Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Kempton Park, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa ponagalo ya mapodisi e e sa lekanang e e tsweletseng le tlhaelo ya dikoloi kwa seteisheneng sa mapodisi sa Kempton Park (Rre M Waters) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Mapodisi –  Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Alberton, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa botsayakarolo jwa baagi le go latelwa ga molao go tlhabololo ya matlo e e tshitsintsweng mo Alberton (Rre D Bergman) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Wattville, Benoni ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go rarabolola bosenyi jo bo tsweletseng go gola, go tsenyeletsa le tirisodikgoka e e ikaegileng ka bong le tirisodikgoka kgatlhanong le bana, le tlhokego ya seteišene sa mapodisa mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Sepodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa palelo e e kwa godimo ya bosenyi le diritibatsi, go neelwa ga dikioseke tsa sepodisi le dikoloi tsa sepodisi mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Sepodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa ditirelo tsa tloso ya matlakala tse di tsweletseng go retelelwa mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba kwa Kokomeng le metse e e mabapi ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa le go beela kwa pele go bulwa gape ga seteishene sa mapodisi sa Kokomeng (Rre I S Seitlholo) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Mapodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (kgaolo 25), ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa go wa ga kabelo e e tshephegang ya motlakase mo mafelo a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaragamelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa dituelo tse di kwa godimo tsa batho bao ba hirileng mo meagong ya khansele (Moh Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti Matlo, Metsi le Kgelelo ya Leswe – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Ward 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the illegal occupation of stand 1/1224 number 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs and Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Kgaolo 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa bodulo jo bo seng mo molaong jwa ntlo 1/1224 nomoro 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Rre D Bergman) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso le Potfolio Komiti ya Sepodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
tsn: DITUMELANO TSA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
tsn: Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Setheo sa Boditšhabatšhaba sa Phetolo ya Jenetiki le Phetolotshelo (ICGEB) go Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga go tlhomiwa ga Karolo ya Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Phetolo ya Jenetiki le Phetolotshelo (ICGEB) mo Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ( E e tlhagisitsweng ka di 18 Lwetse 2019)(NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Thuto e Kgolwane, Saense le Thekenoloji ka di 19 Lwetse 2019 – e begilwe ka 5 Sedimonthole 2019 – e amogetswe ka 10 Mopitlwe 2020) 2019- e begilwe ka 26 Motsheganong 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
tsn: Kamogelo le Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya India, Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Brazil le Puso le Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga Letlole la IBSA tebang le Phediso ya Bohuma le Tlala (e saenilwe ka di 17 Diphalane 2017) (E tlhagisitswe ka di 18 Diphalane 2019). (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka di 22 Diphalane 2019) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka 24 Diphalane 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Baagi ba Matla a Atomiki ba Yuropa (EURATOM) go Tirisanommogo go Tiriso e e Kagiso ya Matla a Nyutlere (E tlhagisitswe ka 14 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Didiriswa tsa Diminerale le Matla ka 18 Ngwanatsele 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Puso ya United Mexican States ka ga Tumalano ya Dithuso tsa Semolao ka ga Dintlha tsa Bosenyi (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020) (NCOP – E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Bosiamisi le Kgopololo ka 10 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 1 Seetebosigo 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Puso ya Dinaga TSe DI Kopaneng tsa Mexicane ka ga Pusetsogae (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020) (NCOP – E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Bosiamisi le Kgopololo ka 10 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 1 Seetebosigo 2020).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
tsn: Tšhata ya Aforika ya Dipalopalo (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bodiredipuso le Tsamaiso ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020).
tsn: Tumalano ya Botsalano le Tirisanommogo (TAC) le Borwa Botlhaba ba Asia (E tlhagisitswe ka 18 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: e rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka 26 Mopitlwe 2020).

eng: ORDERS OF THE DAY:
tsn: DITHULAGANYO TSA LETSATSI:

eng: Debate on Youth Day: Youth Power – Growing South Africa together in a time of Covid-19.
tsn: Ngangisano ka ga Letsatsi la Bašwa: Maatla a Bašwa – Go godisa Aforika Borwa mmogo mo nakong ya Covid-19.

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on Provisional suspension from office of Mr L T Mkansi, a Regional Magistrate, Bloemfontein, tabled in terms of section 13(3)(b) of Magistrates Act, 1993 (Act No 90 of 1993)  (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 29 May 2020, p 4).
tsn: Tshekatsheko ya Pegelo ya Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo ka ga Go beelwa thoko nakwana ga Rre L T Mkansi, Mmagiseterata wa Kgaolo, Bloemfontein, e e tlhagisitsweng go ya ka melawana ya karolo 13(3)(b) ya Molao wa Bommagiseterata, 1993 (Molao Nr 90 wa 1993) (Dikitsiso, Ditlhagiso le Dipegelo tsa Komiti, 29 Motsheganong 2020, ts 4).

eng: Consideration of Request for Approval by Parliament of Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia in terms of section 231(2) of Constitution, 1996 (Report of Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation, see Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 June 2020, p 2).
tsn: Tshekatsheko ya Kopo ya Katlenegiso ke Palamente ya Tumalano ya Botsalano le Tirisanommogo (TAC) le Borwa Botlhaba ba Asia go ya ka melawana ya karolo 231(2) ya Molaotheo, 1996 (Pegelo ya Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabtšhaba, leba Dikitsiso. Ditlhagiso le Dipegelo tsa Komiti, 11 Seetebosigo 2020, ts 2).

eng: Consideration of Request for Approval by Parliament of Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters in terms of section 231(2) of Constitution, 1996 (Report of Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services, see Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 29 May 2020, p 4).
tsn: Tshekatsheko ya Kopo ya go Atlenegisiwa ke Palamente ga Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Puso ya Dinaga tse di Kopaneng tsa Mexico ka ga Thuso e e Kopanetsweng ya Molao mo Dintlheng tsa Bosenyi go ya ka melawana ya karolo 231(2) ya Molaotheo, 1996 (Pegelo ya Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo, leba Dikitsiso, Ditlhagiso le Dipegelo tsa Komiti, 29 Motsheganong 2020, ts 4).

eng: Consideration of Request for Approval by Parliament of Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition in terms of section 231(2) of Constitution, 1996 (Report of Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services, see Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 29 May 2020, p 3).
tsn: Tshekatsheko ya Kopo ya go Atlenegisiwa ke Palamente ga Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Puso ya Dinaga tse di Kopaneng tsa Mexico ka ga Pusetsogae go ya ka melawana ya karolo 231(2) ya Molaotheo, 1996 (Pegelo ya Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo, leba Dikitsiso, Ditlhagiso le Dipegelo tsa Komiti, 29 Motsheganong 2020, ts 3).

eng: APPENDIXES
tsn: MANAANETLALELETSO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
tsn: DIPHETIŠENE TSE DI ROMETSWENG GO DIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Germiston, mmasepalamogolo wa Ekurhuleni ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa go tima ga motlakase go go tsweletseng (Rre M Waters) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Boksburg, mmasepalamogolo wa Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa go tima ga motlakase go go tsweletseng (Rre M Waters) – Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Kempton Park, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa ponagalo ya mapodisi e e sa lekanang e e tsweletseng le tlhaelo ya dikoloi kwa seteisheneng sa mapodisi sa Kempton Park (Rre M Waters) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Mapodisi –  Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Alberton, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa botsayakarolo jwa baagi le go latelwa ga molao go tlhabololo ya matlo e e tshitsintsweng mo Alberton (Rre D Bergman) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Wattville, Benoni ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go rarabolola bosenyi jo bo tsweletseng go gola, go tsenyeletsa le tirisodikgoka e e ikaegileng ka bong le tirisodikgoka kgatlhanong le bana, le tlhokego ya seteišene sa mapodisa mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Sepodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa palelo e e kwa godimo ya bosenyi le diritibatsi, go neelwa ga dikioseke tsa sepodisi le dikoloi tsa sepodisi mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Sepodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa ditirelo tsa tloso ya matlakala tse di tsweletseng go retelelwa mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba kwa Kokomeng le metse e e mabapi ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa le go beela kwa pele go bulwa gape ga seteishene sa mapodisi sa Kokomeng (Rre I S Seitlholo) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Mapodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (kgaolo 25), ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa go wa ga kabelo e e tshephegang ya motlakase mo mafelo a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaragamelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa dituelo tse di kwa godimo tsa batho bao ba hirileng mo meagong ya khansele (Moh Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti Matlo, Metsi le Kgelelo ya Leswe – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Ward 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the illegal occupation of stand 1/1224 number 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs and Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Kgaolo 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa bodulo jo bo seng mo molaong jwa ntlo 1/1224 nomoro 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Rre D Bergman) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso le Potfolio Komiti ya Sepodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

tsn: MELAOTLHOMO E E ROMETSWENG GO DIKOMITI

eng: Protection of State Information Bill [B 6H – 2010] (National Assembly – sec 75) and the President’s reservations on the constitutionality of the Bill as submitted to him (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 12 June 2020, p 7) – (Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services – National Assembly).
tsn: Molaotlhomo wa Tshireletso ya Tshedimosetso ya Puso [B 6H – 2010] (Kokoano Bosetšhaba – kar 75) le dipelaelo tsa Moporesidente ka ga go nna mo molaong ga Molaotlhomo jaaka o rometswe kwa go ena (Dikitsiso, Ditlhagiso le Dipegelo tsa Komiti, 12 Seetebosigo 2020, ts 7) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Liquor Products Amendment Bill [B 10B – 2016] (National Assembly – sec 75) and the President’s reservations on the constitutionality of the Bill as submitted to him (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 12 June 2020, p 2) – (Portfolio Committee on Agriculture, Land Reform and Rural Development – National Assembly).
tsn: Mametlelelo ya Molaotlhomo wa Dikuno tsa Nnotagi [B 10B – 2016] (Kokoano Bosetšhaba – kar 75) le dipelaelo tsa Moporesidente ka ga go nna mo molaong ga Molaotlhomo jaaka o rometswe kwa go ena (Dikitsiso, Ditlhagiso le Dipegelo tsa Komiti, 12 Seetebosigo 2020, ts 2) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Temothuo, Ntšhwafatso ya Mafatshe le Tlhabololo ya Magae – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
tsn: DITUMELANO TSA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
tsn: Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Setheo sa Boditšhabatšhaba sa Phetolo ya Jenetiki le Phetolotshelo (ICGEB) go Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga go tlhomiwa ga Karolo ya Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Phetolo ya Jenetiki le Phetolotshelo (ICGEB) mo Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ( E e tlhagisitsweng ka di 18 Lwetse 2019)(NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Thuto e Kgolwane, Saense le Thekenoloji ka di 19 Lwetse 2019 – e begilwe ka 5 Sedimonthole 2019 – e amogetswe ka 10 Mopitlwe 2020) 2019- e begilwe ka 26 Motsheganong 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
tsn: Kamogelo le Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya India, Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Brazil le Puso le Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga Letlole la IBSA tebang le Phediso ya Bohuma le Tlala (e saenilwe ka di 17 Diphalane 2017) (E tlhagisitswe ka di 18 Diphalane 2019). (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka di 22 Diphalane 2019) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka 24 Diphalane 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Baagi ba Matla a Atomiki ba Yuropa (EURATOM) go Tirisanommogo go Tiriso e e Kagiso ya Matla a Nyutlere (E tlhagisitswe ka 14 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Didiriswa tsa Diminerale le Matla ka 18 Ngwanatsele 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Puso ya United Mexican States ka ga Tumalano ya Dithuso tsa Semolao ka ga Dintlha tsa Bosenyi (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020) (NCOP – E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Bosiamisi le Kgopololo ka 10 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 1 Seetebosigo 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Puso ya Dinaga TSe DI Kopaneng tsa Mexicane ka ga Pusetsogae (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020) (NCOP – E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Bosiamisi le Kgopololo ka 10 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 1 Seetebosigo 2020).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
tsn: Tšhata ya Aforika ya Dipalopalo (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bodiredipuso le Tsamaiso ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020).
tsn: Tumalano ya Botsalano le Tirisanommogo (TAC) le Borwa Botlhaba ba Asia (E tlhagisitswe ka 18 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: e rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka 26 Mopitlwe 2020).

eng: MOTIONS:
tsn: DITSHITSINYO:

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House suspends Rule 290(2)(a), which provides inter alia that the debate on the Second Reading of the Bill may not commence before at least three Assembly working days have elapsed since the committee’s report was tabled, for the purposes of conducting the Second Reading today on the Adjustments Appropriation Bill [B 10B - 2020] (National Assembly – sec 77).
tsn: Tshitsinyokakangwa (Semesegolo sa Lekoko le le Busang): gore Ntlo e belethoko Molao 290(2)(a), o o beelang thoko magareng ga tse dingwe go buisiwa ga Puiso ya Bobedi ya Molaotlhomo pele ga bbonye malatsi a mararo a tiro ya Kokoano a fetile fa e sale pegelo ya komiti e tlhagisitswe, go direla gore Puiso ya Bobedi e diriwe gompieno mo Molaotlhomo wa Phetogo go Tekanyetso [B 10 - 2020] (Kokoano Bosetšhaba – kar 77).

eng: APPENDIXES
tsn: MANAANETLALELETSO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
tsn: DIPHETIŠENE TSE DI ROMETSWENG GO DIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa ditirelo tsa tloso ya matlakala tse di tsweletseng go retelelwa mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba kwa Kokomeng le metse e e mabapi ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa le go beela kwa pele go bulwa gape ga seteishene sa mapodisi sa Kokomeng (Rre I S Seitlholo) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Mapodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (kgaolo 25), ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa go wa ga kabelo e e tshephegang ya motlakase mo mafelo a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa dituelo tse di kwa godimo tsa batho bao ba hirileng mo meagong ya khansele (Moh Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Matlo, Metsi le Kgelelo ya Leswe – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Jamestown, Stellenbosch, ba gwetlha Kokoano go batlisisa phetolo, ke Eskom, ya dithata tsa botsamaisi jwa kgolaganyo ya motlakase ya Jamestown go mmasepala wa Stellenbosch (Ng L Shreiber) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba -  Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises - National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, ba gwetlha Kokoano go batlisisa motlakase o o tswleletseng go tima mo Germiston (Moh M Clarke) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba - Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Teropo ya Letsitele, Wate 23, Tzaneen, ba gwetlha Kokoano go netefatsa gore mmasepala wa Tzaneen o ikobela melao le melawana, le gore o tsenyatirisong thulaganyo ya tikologo go mafelong a a tshwanetseng, go tsenyeletsa le go elatlhoko le go emisa ditirwana tsotlhe tse di seng mo molaong (Moh D van der Walt) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go balemirui le baagi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ka kemedi ya AGRI Letaba, ba gwetlha Kopano go batlisisa go tima go go feteletseng ga motlakase, ketsaetsego go matla a motlakase, le tlhokomelo e e bokoa kgotsa e e seyong fa e sale 2016 ka ntlha ya go palelwa ga Mmasepala wa Greater Tzaneen (Moh D van der Walt) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

tsn: MELAOTLHOMO E E ROMETSWENG GO KOMITITSHWARAGANELO YA MELAO (JTM)

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
tsn: DITUMELANO TSA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
tsn: Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Setheo sa Boditšhabatšhaba sa Phetolo ya Jenetiki le Phetolotshelo (ICGEB) go Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga go tlhomiwa ga Karolo ya Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Phetolo ya Jenetiki le Phetolotshelo (ICGEB) mo Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ( E e tlhagisitsweng ka di 18 Lwetse 2019)(NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Thuto e Kgolwane, Saense le Thekenoloji ka di 19 Lwetse 2019 – e begilwe ka 5 Sedimonthole 2019 – e amogetswe ka 10 Mopitlwe 2020) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Thuto le Thekenoloji, Metshameko, Botaki le Setso ka 19 Ngwanatsele 2019- e begilwe ka 26 Motsheganong 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
tsn: Kamogelo le Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya India, Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Brazil le Puso le Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga Letlole la IBSA tebang le Phediso ya Bohuma le Tlala (e saenilwe ka di 17 Diphalane 2017) (E tlhagisitswe ka di 18 Diphalane 2019). (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka di 22 Diphalane 2019) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka 24 Diphalane 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Baagi ba Matla a Atomiki ba Yuropa (EURATOM) go Tirisanommogo go Tiriso e e Kagiso ya Matla a Nyutlere (E tlhagisitswe ka 14 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Didiriswa tsa Diminerale le Matla ka 18 Ngwanatsele 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Puso ya United Mexican States ka ga Tumalano ya Dithuso tsa Semolao ka ga Dintlha tsa Bosenyi (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 29 Motsheganong – e amogetswe ka 17 Seetebosigo 2020) (NCOP – E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Bosiamisi le Kgopololo ka 10 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 1 Seetebosigo 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 202 0– approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Puso ya Dinaga Tse di Kopaneng tsa Mexicane ka ga Pusetsogae (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 29 Motsheganong 2020 – e amogetswe ka 17 Seetebosigo 2020) (NCOP – E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Bosiamisi le Kgopololo ka 10 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 1 Seetebosigo 2020).

tsn: Tšhata ya Aforika ya Dipalopalo (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bodiredipuso le Tsamaiso ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020).

eng: APPENDIXES
tsn: MANAANETLALELETSO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
tsn: DIPHETIŠENE TSE DI ROMETSWENG GO DIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa ditirelo tsa tloso ya matlakala tse di tsweletseng go retelelwa mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba kwa Kokomeng le metse e e mabapi ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa le go beela kwa pele go bulwa gape ga seteishene sa mapodisi sa Kokomeng (Rre I S Seitlholo) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Mapodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (kgaolo 25), ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa go wa ga kabelo e e tshephegang ya motlakase mo mafelo a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa dituelo tse di kwa godimo tsa batho bao ba hirileng mo meagong ya khansele (Moh Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Matlo, Metsi le Kgelelo ya Leswe – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Jamestown, Stellenbosch, ba gwetlha Kokoano go batlisisa phetolo, ke Eskom, ya dithata tsa botsamaisi jwa kgolaganyo ya motlakase ya Jamestown go mmasepala wa Stellenbosch (Ng L Shreiber) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba -  Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises - National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, ba gwetlha Kokoano go batlisisa motlakase o o tswleletseng go tima mo Germiston (Moh M Clarke) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba - Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Teropo ya Letsitele, Wate 23, Tzaneen, ba gwetlha Kokoano go netefatsa gore mmasepala wa Tzaneen o ikobela melao le melawana, le gore o tsenyatirisong thulaganyo ya tikologo go mafelong a a tshwanetseng, go tsenyeletsa le go elatlhoko le go emisa ditirwana tsotlhe tse di seng mo molaong (Moh D van der Walt) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go balemirui le baagi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ka kemedi ya AGRI Letaba, ba gwetlha Kopano go batlisisa go tima go go feteletseng ga motlakase, ketsaetsego go matla a motlakase, le tlhokomelo e e bokoa kgotsa e e seyong fa e sale 2016 ka ntlha ya go palelwa ga Mmasepala wa Greater Tzaneen (Moh D van der Walt) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
tsn: DITUMELANO TSA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
tsn: Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Setheo sa Boditšhabatšhaba sa Phetolo ya Jenetiki le Phetolotshelo (ICGEB) go Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga go tlhomiwa ga Karolo ya Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Phetolo ya Jenetiki le Phetolotshelo (ICGEB) mo Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ( E e tlhagisitsweng ka di 18 Lwetse 2019)(NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Thuto e Kgolwane, Saense le Thekenoloji ka di 19 Lwetse 2019 – e begilwe ka 5 Sedimonthole 2019 – e amogetswe ka 10 Mopitlwe 2020) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Thuto le Thekenoloji, Metshameko, Botaki le Setso ka 19 Ngwanatsele 2019- e begilwe ka 26 Motsheganong 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
tsn: Kamogelo le Tumelano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya India, Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Brazil le Puso le Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ka ga Letlole la IBSA tebang le Phediso ya Bohuma le Tlala (e saenilwe ka di 17 Diphalane 2017) (E tlhagisitswe ka di 18 Diphalane 2019). (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Dikamano le Tirisanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka di 22 Diphalane 2019) (NCOP: E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Pabalesego le Bosiamisi ka 24 Diphalane 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Puso ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Baagi ba Matla a Atomiki ba Yuropa (EURATOM) go Tirisanommogo go Tiriso e e Kagiso ya Matla a Nyutlere (E tlhagisitswe ka 14 Ngwanatsele 2019) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Didiriswa tsa Diminerale le Matla ka 18 Ngwanatsele 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Puso ya United Mexican States ka ga Tumalano ya Dithuso tsa Semolao ka ga Dintlha tsa Bosenyi (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 29 Motsheganong – e amogetswe ka 17 Seetebosigo 2020) (NCOP – E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Bosiamisi le Kgopololo ka 10 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 1 Seetebosigo 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 202 0– approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa le Puso ya Dinaga Tse di Kopaneng tsa Mexicane ka ga Pusetsogae (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 29 Motsheganong 2020 – e amogetswe ka 17 Seetebosigo 2020) (NCOP – E rometswe go Komitikgetho ya Bosiamisi le Kgopololo ka 10 Mopitlwe 2020 – e begilwe ka 1 Seetebosigo 2020).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
tsn: Tšhata ya Aforika ya Dipalopalo (E tlhagisitswe ka 5 Mopitlwe 2020) (NA: E rometswe go Potfolio Komiti ya Bodiredipuso le Tsamaiso ka 9 Mopitlwe 2020).

eng: APPENDIXES
tsn: MANAANETLALELETSO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
tsn: DIPHETIŠENE TSE DI ROMETSWENG GO DIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa ditirelo tsa tloso ya matlakala tse di tsweletseng go retelelwa mo kgaolong tsa bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba kwa Kokomeng le metse e e mabapi ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa le go beela kwa pele go bulwa gape ga seteishene sa mapodisi sa Kokomeng (Rre I S Seitlholo) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Mapodisi – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (kgaolo 25), ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni ba ipiletsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go tlhotlhomisa go wa ga kabelo e e tshephegang ya motlakase mo mafelo a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba ipiletsa go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go batlisisa dituelo tse di kwa godimo tsa batho bao ba hirileng mo meagong ya khansele (Moh Ismail) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Matlo, Metsi le Kgelelo ya Leswe – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Jamestown, Stellenbosch, ba gwetlha Kokoano go batlisisa phetolo, ke Eskom, ya dithata tsa botsamaisi jwa kgolaganyo ya motlakase ya Jamestown go mmasepala wa Stellenbosch (Ng L Shreiber) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba -  Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises - National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, ba gwetlha Kokoano go batlisisa motlakase o o tswleletseng go tima mo Germiston (Moh M Clarke) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba - Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go baagi ba Teropo ya Letsitele, Wate 23, Tzaneen, ba gwetlha Kokoano go netefatsa gore mmasepala wa Tzaneen o ikobela melao le melawana, le gore o tsenyatirisong thulaganyo ya tikologo go mafelong a a tshwanetseng, go tsenyeletsa le go elatlhoko le go emisa ditirwana tsotlhe tse di seng mo molaong (Moh D van der Walt) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tsn: Phetišene go tswa go balemirui le baagi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ka kemedi ya AGRI Letaba, ba gwetlha Kopano go batlisisa go tima go go feteletseng ga motlakase, ketsaetsego go matla a motlakase, le tlhokomelo e e bokoa kgotsa e e seyong fa e sale 2016 ka ntlha ya go palelwa ga Mmasepala wa Greater Tzaneen (Moh D van der Walt) – (Potfolio Komiti ya Pusotshwaraganelwa le Merero ya Setso – Kokoano Bosetšhaba).
